issue.title: www.yahoo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.yahoo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.yahoo.com%2F) ### Comment > Prior to the most recent update, i had setup custom the previous version blocked the ads but left empty spaces as per the screenshot i shared. I manually blocked all the individual "empty" ad spaces using manual/custom rules and the yahoo page was ad free and no random spaces. AFTER the update to the most recent version, the ads themselves were blocked but the random "ad" spaces remained. I manually blocked all those random spaces again with custom block rules. But, the yahoo auto-refreshes and every time, the "empty ad" spaces return despite of how many times I block them. Its not an issue, more like an FYI for you guys. My custom block rules are rendered useless once the page refreshes every time. ``` Username: @Hear AdGuard ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/ehjvqbpemvsc8o0oscgo4ow04sk4444jz7cijwa7y8.png?nc=1)

**Browser API**:

**Miscellaneous**:

Hide your User-Agent (custom user-agent),
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:

Only adGuard setup on my PC.` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.0+%285225%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&browser=firefox&filters=2.3.4.10.17.18.19.20.21.22&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%252C%250AWeb%2520of%2520Trust%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-wot%252F1.0%252Fwot.user.js%29&dns.filters=1.15%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=false&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.referrer=custom%2520referer&stealth.user_agent=custom%2520user-agent&stealth.ip=208.54.104.184&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.first_party_cookies=2200&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true)
